import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Layout from '../layouts/layout.js' const Add_product = ({ data, reLoad }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({ "id": "21" }); const [products, setProducts] = useState(data); console.log(products); const onHandleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); setProducts([...products,product]); } const onHandleChange = event => { const {name, value} = event.target; setProduct(pre => { return {...pre,[name]:value} }); } const onHandleClick = (id) => { // onRemove(id); } const section = <>
{products.map((product, index) => )}

) } export default Add_product
